Text: Thank you very much. Love your work mate
Thank you.  Love this series, and as always, your uploads are GREATLY appreciated.  My comics collection is long gone, but yours will live forever.
thanks LTS. looks like another great read.

You're all most welcome, and thanks for the kind words. Throw this one in the pile of books that I didn't expect to get much attention, but did. I just never know.

Hey, MonkeyMindUSB, better back those files up. ; )
